name: RUN (itch) (duilioman)
description:
Run is an endless runner were you are the monster terrorizing the neighborhood. Take control of a monster going for a hunt at night in this little cute experience. Game made for QuarkJam 1, an endless runner halloween themed. Made in unreal engine.

Duilio Candotti - Programmer
Leandro Andrade - Technical Artist
Pablo Soto - UI artist & Game Designer
